about.paragraph1: My name is Pham Giang Thai Duong, i am in my final year and waiting for graduation at the University of Science, VNU-HCM. Throughout my academic journey, I have honed my skills in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and Express.js, equipping me with a solid foundation for modern web development. I am particularly interested in Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices, and I am dedicated to building a successful career as a backend developer.
about.paragraph2: My ambition is to make meaningful contributions to large-scale, complex projects that tackle critical challenges in security, data management, and beyond. I am eager to leverage my knowledge and experience to create innovative solutions that drive progress and enhance user experiences.
about.title: About Me

ads-management.description: This innovative application is crafted to revolutionize the management of advertising boards across City X. By addressing the needs of residents, local officials at both ward and district levels, and the Department of Culture and Sports, it offers a powerful, transparent, and efficient solution for overseeing the city's advertising landscape. Embrace this opportunity to enhance communication and engagement within our community.

frontend.overview-01: There are two essential web applications designed to enhance engagement and streamline communication: one tailored specifically for citizens and residents, and the other dedicated to supporting ward and district officers, as well as officials from the Department of Culture and Sports. These platforms aim to empower users and facilitate efficient collaboration within the community.
frontend.overview-02: Citizens have the opportunity to explore locations featuring hiring contracts for advertisements, gaining access to essential details such as the location, timing, and the companies that are hiring. Additionally, they are encouraged to report any issues they encounter with these advertisements, helping to maintain a transparent and efficient hiring process. Your participation makes a difference!
frontend.overview-03: Officers can reach out to companies and businesses to facilitate the hiring of advertising spaces. They are responsible for managing these locations, addressing any issues reported, and consulting with officials from the Department of Culture and Sports to confirm whether the company is permitted to hire these spaces.
frontend.overview-04: Officials from the Department of Culture and Sports have complete control over the entire system, which includes managing lists of districts, wards, types of advertisements, and advertisement locations. They have access to statistics related to reports and their processing status from lower levels. Additionally, account creation and area assignment for management purposes are easily managed.

backend.tech-01: Built with Express.js to ensure efficient and robust server-side operations, delivering optimal performance and reliability.
backend.tech-02: Developed with Node.js to provide a high-performance backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability and speed.
backend.tech-03: Utilizes MongoDB for reliable and efficient data storage solutions, ensuring data integrity and accessibility.
backend.tech-04: Incorporates Socket.IO to deliver real-time notifications, keeping users informed about updates.
backend.tech-05: Uses Jenkins for continuous integration and continuous deployment, ensuring smooth and automated workflows.
backend.tech-06: Docker is used for containerization, ensuring consistent environments across development, testing, and production.

frontend.tech-01: Leverages the power of React.js to deliver an engaging and highly responsive user interface that enhances the overall user experience.
frontend.tech-02: Harnesses the power of Material UI to craft an engaging and highly responsive user interface that captivates users and enhances their experience.
frontend.tech-03: Utilizes Leaflet.js for interactive maps, allowing users to view and interact with advertising locations.

car-booking.description: This revolutionary application, comparable to Uber and Grab, is purposefully crafted to transform the car booking experience for residents of City X. Utilizing the powerful capabilities of Flutter and React, it boasts intuitive mobile applications for both customers and drivers, alongside a user-friendly web platform for call center agents. Customers can effortlessly secure rides through the mobile app or by connecting with our attentive call center agents, ensuring a seamless and remarkable service that redefines convenience and efficiency.

call-center.overview-01: The call center is your go-to solution for customers who donâ€™t have the app. With just a simple phone call, you can easily book a car, ensuring a smooth and convenient experience.
call-center.overview-02: When you call our center, a dedicated agent will promptly assist you. They will gather essential information, including your name, pick-up location, drop-off location, and preferred vehicle type, ensuring a seamless and efficient booking process for your convenience.
call-center.overview-03: The system will expertly select a driver as usual, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for the customer. They will promptly receive a notification on their phone, clearly indicating whether their booking was accepted or declined.

customer.overview-01: To enjoy our services, users are required to set up an account using their phone number. You can effortlessly book a car either through our user-friendly mobile app or by reaching out to our dedicated call center.
customer.overview-02: Users can effortlessly book cars with options for 4 or 7 seats to perfectly suit their needs. Our pricing is transparent and competitive, adjusting based on distance, time of day, and peak hour demands, ensuring you get the best value for your journey.
customer.overview-03: Users can effortlessly track the driver's location in real time, ensuring peace of mind and enhancing trust in the journey.
customer.overview-04: Users must choose to pay either with cash or through ZaloPay. Our payment process is secure and efficient, ensuring a seamless transaction experience.
customer.overview-05: Customers can take advantage of exclusive discounts to enhance their booking experience.
customer.overview-06: Users have the opportunity to effortlessly view their booking history and share their feedback by rating their drivers, ensuring a more tailored and satisfying experience.

driver.overview-01: Drivers have the convenient option to effortlessly update their name, vehicle information, and driver's license details directly through the app, ensuring that their records are always accurate and up to date.
driver.overview-02: Drivers instantly receive notifications in their app whenever someone books their services, giving them the power to easily accept or decline the booking. This feature ensures they have full control over their schedule and can prioritize the rides that best suit their needs.
driver.overview-03: Drivers can effortlessly receive bookings through the call center, allowing them to conveniently access their booking history and ratings. This streamlined process ensures that they stay informed and engaged with their performance.
driver.overview-04: The app actively tracks the driver's location throughout the journey, ensuring they stay on course and offering reassuring peace of mind. With this innovative feature, drivers can navigate confidently without the fear of getting lost.
driver.overview-05: Drivers can effortlessly view their earnings through their digital wallet, ensuring transparency and providing a clear overview of their financial performance.

s2-geometry.overview-01: The S2-geometry algorithm is utilized to efficiently select the best driver for a customer based on their location. This algorithm divides the Earth's surface into a hierarchy of cells, allowing for precise and scalable spatial indexing.
s2-geometry.overview-02: When a customer requests a ride, the algorithm identifies the cell corresponding to the customer's location and searches for available drivers within nearby cells. This ensures that the search is both efficient and accurate, minimizing the time it takes to find a suitable driver.
s2-geometry.overview-03: By leveraging the S2-geometry algorithm, the system can quickly match customers with the closest drivers, optimizing the overall ride-hailing experience and reducing wait times.

backend.tech-01: Built with Express.js to ensure efficient and robust server-side operations, delivering optimal performance and reliability.
backend.tech-02: Incorporates Socket.IO to deliver real-time notifications, keeping users informed about their ride status.
backend.tech-03: Utilizes MongoDB for reliable and efficient data storage solutions, ensuring data integrity and accessibility.
backend.tech-04: Integrates RabbitMQ for robust message queuing, ensuring smooth communication between services.
backend.tech-05: Docker is used for containerization, ensuring consistent environments across development, testing, and production.

mobile.tech-01: Developed using Flutter to create a seamless and intuitive mobile application experience.
mobile.tech-02: Integrates Google Maps to provide accurate location tracking and navigation.
mobile.tech-03: Integrates ZaloPay to provide a secure and convenient online payment solution for customers.

chat-app.description: Introducing a powerful real-time chat application that empowers users to effortlessly create chat rooms and communicate with one another. Developed using cutting-edge technologies such as React, Node.js, and Firebase Cloud, this application not only facilitates seamless messaging but also allows users to join dynamic chat rooms and easily access their chat history. Experience a new level of connectivity and interaction with our innovative platform!

frontend.overview-01: Effortlessly locate any user by entering their name in the search bar. Take advantage of this simple feature to connect with the people you need!
frontend.overview-02: Effortlessly create a new chat room by simply initiating a conversation with a user you wish to chat with.
frontend.overview-03: You have the ability to effortlessly send text messages, captivating images, and expressive emojis.

frontend.tech-01: Engineered with Node.js to deliver highly efficient and robust server-side operations, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
frontend.tech-02: Leverages the power of React.js to deliver an engaging and highly responsive user interface that enhances the overall user experience.
frontend.tech-03: Leverages Firebase to enable seamless real-time chat and robust data storage solutions.

coffee-order.description: Introducing a powerful application crafted with Kotlin in Android Studio, JavaScript, and MySQL. This innovative platform not only enables users to effortlessly order their favorite coffee and customize their selections with a variety of toppings but also includes a robust administration panel for streamlined management. Experience convenience and control like never before!

frontend.overview-01: Customers can effortlessly explore and select their ideal coffee from an extensive array of options, guaranteeing a personalized and truly delightful experience that will elevate their coffee journey.
frontend.overview-02: Users have the flexibility to customize their coffee order with a variety of toppings, allowing them to create the perfect beverage tailored to their preferences.
frontend.overview-03: The application supports seamless online payments through ZaloPay, providing a convenient and secure payment method for customers.
frontend.overview-04: Customers can effortlessly access their order history and quickly reorder their favorite coffee, making the entire ordering process not just seamless, but also incredibly convenient.
frontend.overview-05: Customers receive real-time notifications about their order status, ensuring they are always informed and updated.

backend.tech-01: Built with Express.js to ensure efficient and robust server-side operations, delivering optimal performance and reliability.
backend.tech-02: Developed with Node.js to provide a high-performance backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability and speed.
backend.tech-03: Utilizes MySQL for reliable and efficient data storage solutions, ensuring data integrity and accessibility.
backend.tech-04: Incorporates Socket.IO to deliver real-time notifications, keeping customers informed about their order status.

frontend.tech-01: Developed using Android Studio to create a seamless and intuitive mobile application experience.
frontend.tech-02: Integrates ZaloPay to provide a secure and convenient online payment solution for customers.

fam-fund.description: Introducing a powerful financial management application designed to help families track their expenses, set budgets, and achieve their financial goals. This intuitive tool empowers users to manage their finances effectively, visualize their spending habits, and make informed financial decisions. With features for expense tracking, budgeting, and goal setting, this application is your trusted companion for financial success. Additionally, it includes features for scheduling, education management for kids, news updates, a chat function to keep the family connected and informed, etc.

home.description: I am a software engineer with a passion for building web applications and solving problems. I have experience working with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and more.

hotel-booking.description: This innovative web application revolutionizes the way users book hotel rooms with unmatched ease and efficiency. Developed with cutting-edge technologies like React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, it offers a seamless user experience. Guests can effortlessly explore a wide selection of available rooms, secure their reservations instantly, and conveniently track their booking historyâ€”all in one place. Furthermore, the powerful admin panel empowers administrators to effectively manage room inventory and bookings, ensuring a smooth operation. Experience the future of hotel booking with this exceptional application!

frontend.overview-01: Discover the convenience of exploring hotel apartments without the need to log in. However, to secure your booking and enjoy a seamless experience, simply log in when you're ready to reserve your room.
frontend.overview-02: Guests have the opportunity to rate the hotel apartments using a star system and share insightful comments about their stay, helping future visitors make informed choices. Your valuable feedback can significantly enhance the experience for everyone!
frontend.overview-03: Hotel managers and owners have the opportunity to enhance their visibility and attract more guests by requesting access to list their business on our website. With this access, they can easily add rooms, apartments, and additional offerings, maximizing their potential for bookings and ensuring a seamless guest experience.
frontend.overview-04: Hotel managers and owners have the valuable capability to access and review the comprehensive list of customer bookings, empowering them to enhance service and optimize operations.
frontend.overview-05: Administrators play a crucial role in effectively managing accounts and decisively approving business requests, ensuring seamless operations and fostering growth.

backend.tech-01: Designed with Express.js, this framework guarantees exceptional efficiency and robust server-side operations, delivering unparalleled performance and unwavering reliability.
backend.tech-02: Developed with Node.js, this application delivers a robust and high-performance backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability and speed to meet the demands of modern applications.
backend.tech-03: Leverages MongoDB to provide highly flexible and scalable data storage solutions, ensuring your data management needs are met with efficiency and reliability.

frontend.tech-01: Harnesses the power of Material UI to craft an engaging and highly responsive user interface that captivates users and enhances their experience.
frontend.tech-02: Leverages the power of React.js to deliver an engaging and highly responsive user interface that enhances the overall user experience.

my-shop.description: Introducing a powerful Windows application expertly developed using C#, WPF, and MSSQL Server, designed to streamline your management of computer and PC products and orders. With this innovative tool, users can effortlessly apply discounts and gain valuable insights through comprehensive sales statistics, empowering you to optimize your business operations and drive success.

frontend.overview-01: Dashboard to see total products, total sell in week and month, top 5 products with the least items.
frontend.overview-02: Manage customers efficiently and keep track of their details.
frontend.overview-03: Manage product categories to organize your inventory effectively.
frontend.overview-04: Manage products, including adding, updating, and deleting items.
frontend.overview-05: Manage orders, ensuring smooth processing and tracking.
frontend.overview-06: Manage discounts to offer promotions and special deals.
frontend.overview-07: Statistics (chart): revenue and profit by day, week, month, and year, total products sold by day, week, month, and year.
frontend.overview-08: Store and backup database to ensure data integrity and security.

frontend.tech-01: Harnesses the power of WPF to deliver a highly responsive and visually appealing user interface, enhancing the overall user experience.
frontend.tech-02: Utilizes Entity Framework to provide a robust and efficient data access layer, ensuring seamless interaction with the database.
frontend.tech-03: Leverages MSSQL Server to deliver reliable and scalable data storage solutions, ensuring data integrity and accessibility.

online-academy.description: Introducing an innovative online learning platform, expertly crafted with Handlebars, Express, and MongoDB. This application empowers learners by offering a diverse range of courses across multiple subjects. Users can easily enroll in courses, access a wealth of engaging course materials, and enhance their knowledge through interactive quizzes and assignments. Transform your learning experience and achieve your educational goals with us!

frontend.overview-01: Students can effortlessly enroll in courses and unlock a treasure trove of engaging and enriching course materials.
frontend.overview-02: By actively engaging in assignments and quizzes, students can significantly enhance their learning experience and deepen their understanding of the material.
frontend.overview-03: Educators can effortlessly upload and update courses, guaranteeing that the content is not only current but also highly relevant to students' needs. This empowers teachers to enhance the learning experience and ensure their materials are always impactful.
frontend.overview-04: Teachers can engage students by asking thought-provoking questions and providing constructive feedback, thereby cultivating a dynamic and collaborative learning environment.
frontend.overview-05: Administrators play a pivotal role in enhancing the learning experience by effectively managing courses, users, and content. Their oversight ensures a seamless and engaging educational environment for everyone involved.

frontend.tech-01: Harnesses the power of Handlebars to craft dynamic and highly efficient templates that elevate the user interface experience.
frontend.tech-02: The design leverages Bootstrap to create a dynamic and visually stunning experience, ensuring that it is both responsive and engaging for users.
frontend.tech-03: Harnesses the power of MongoDB to deliver highly flexible and scalable data storage solutions that adapt to your evolving needs.

paint-app.description: Introducing a powerful drawing application inspired by the beloved Windows Paint. This intuitive tool empowers users to unleash their creativity, offering features for drawing, erasing, changing colors, and seamlessly saving their artwork. Built with cutting-edge technology using C#, WPF, and XAML, this application is designed to enhance your artistic experience and bring your visions to life.

frontend.overview-01: Users can effortlessly draw various shapes such as rectangles, circles, and lines, utilizing a plugin architecture that enhances flexibility and functionality.
frontend.overview-02: Users have the ability to rotate shapes, change their size, and modify the color of lines, providing a highly customizable drawing experience.
frontend.overview-03: The application allows users to change the type of outline, choose outline thickness, and apply different styles to their drawings.
frontend.overview-04: Users can easily undo, redo, duplicate, copy, and paste elements, ensuring a seamless and efficient drawing process.
frontend.overview-05: The intuitive interface and robust features make it easy for users to create and manage their artwork, enhancing their overall creative experience.

frontend.tech-01: Harnesses the power of WPF to deliver a highly responsive and visually appealing user interface, enhancing the overall user experience.

video-sharing.description: Introducing a cutting-edge video-sharing platform developed with the latest technologies, including React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Users can effortlessly upload their videos, engage with content through likes and shares, and subscribe to their favorite channels. This innovative application is a powerful clone of YouTube, designed to enhance your video-sharing experience and foster a vibrant online community. Join us and be a part of this dynamic platform!

frontend.overview-01: Seamlessly upload your videos and instantly connect with the community by sharing your creativity!
frontend.overview-02: Amplify your experience by actively engaging with the content through likes, shares, and comments. Your participation makes a difference!
frontend.overview-03: Enhance your experience and never miss out on fresh content by subscribing to your favorite channels.

frontend.tech-02: Harnessing the power of React.js, we deliver an engaging and interactive user experience that captivates and retains users.
